description: A man who hosted a party during the coronavirus lockdown and had cannabis posted to him is jailed.
title: Coronavirus: Party host who had drugs posted to island jailed
title_page: Coronavirus: Party host who had drugs posted to island jailed - BBC News
maintext: The court was told he left his property on 7 May, following an argument with his girlfriend, and became intoxicated as he walked to his mother's home nearby.
